migration.title: Convert to Workspace
migration.detectDescription: Scanning for Git repositories in this directory...
migration.alreadyStandalone: This is already a Git repository. No conversion needed.
migration.noReposFound: No Git repositories found in subdirectories.
migration.configureDescription: Name your workspace and select which repositories to include.
migration.confirmDescription: Review your workspace configuration before creating.
migration.completeDescription: Your workspace has been set up successfully.
migration.completeMessage: You can now manage multiple repositories from this workspace.
